website_summaries.verdict: Distinctive style with a wide temple area that tapers back to the ear area.
pros: Even though frame is larger and thicker than some other styles, its all-plastic construction keeps it lightweight
Polycarbonate lenses have 100% UV-protection coating and will stand up to rough treatment
Several frame and lens colors available, allowing you to personalize your choice
Clean lines on the frame look great
cons: These sunglasses tend to run small, meaning the fit will be tight for some

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: These are real batwolf glasses. I own multiple pairs I purchased from the Oakley store and these are the real deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Glock17

customer_reviews.title: close to face
customer_reviews.text: these are great wrap around sunglasses. Lens clarity is great. fit is tight and close to face which is great but that can lead to lenses fogging up. even when sweating on the beach they never slid off my face. But careful or you will end up with two tone face. comes with microfiber bag to carry and clean but best you buy something that protects them more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clearly Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of Batwolfs for a couple years now, they're the black frames and make for excellent wrap around isolation from the sun and wind. The difference between the black framed ones and these shiny new clear frames is that sunlight gets through the sides but so does peripheral movement detection. They look slick, and that's what it is all about.
customer_reviews.author: Ross M. Walline

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Just awesome sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. I’ve been a Persol person for many many years, but these sunglasses are just awesome. I love the “Prizm” lenses. They intensify the colors. I am surprised by these sunglasses. It takes a bit to get used to how they feel on your face but afterwards you won’t feel them anymore. I highly recommend these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: ScouTace

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses are more grey than they look in the picture and the cerakote on them is awesome. Great quality and exactly what I wanted. They have a bigger frame and fit very nicely on a medium to large head. I prefer the black icons that came with them just think they blend better. Overall great sunglasses and feel very sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: My husbands favorite sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. This is the 3rd pair of these I have bought for my husband. He looks good in them and they are light weight and comfortable he says. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Engbaum

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: OK so im not even sure these were genuine Oakleys... They broke not within three months of me having the glasses, my last genuine pair of Oakleys lasted 7 years! Very disappointed in these. This has totally turned me off of the entire brand. Don't know if ill ever go with Oakleys again. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lopez

customer_reviews.title: O
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice had them for a year now they are an older set no red batch but has numbers on the inside to confirm Oakley brand............
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R PUCKETT

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Oakley Sunglasses...
customer_reviews.text: These men's polarized sunglasses are by far the best sunglasses I've ever owned. They don't stretch after wearing them for awhile, nor do they get scratched up. The polarized lenses help with give the crystal clear view that is achieved while wearing them. They're extremely versatile sunglasses, as I've worn them golfing, and with a suit on, as well. I would definitely purchase another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa & Richard

customer_reviews.title: Damn good sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described..genuine Oakley Batwolf sunglasses. There was a sweet surprise reimagining Oakley when my glasses included a another set of polished black Oakley Icons. And another fabulous surprise that oakley gives to you. Which I won't spoil it because it is to awesome to ruin. Oakley sunglasses a super durable..My last pair was the fuel cell the lenses are now a little too scratched to wear but I have been wearing them for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Craft

customer_reviews.title: Go to the mall kiosk, or stores be fire you buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality made product, the Polarized lenses are super. The lense hides the nose support bridge, and it makes them look like the big glasses that old people wear, so I gave them to my bud.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cutler

customer_reviews.title: My first Oakley's
customer_reviews.text: These are my first - this survey came out way too early (intentional?). I'll know a lot more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Was so in love
customer_reviews.text: They were a great pair of sunglasses until they broke I've been through two sets of batwolfs now I got me a set of Ridgeline Oakleys
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Came with extra silver Os. Recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Chris m.

customer_reviews.title: Oakley polarized prizm shallow water beats Maui jim rose
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. I am replacing Maui jim rose lens sunglasses used while riding my motorcycle. Was worried about lens quality going from Maui jim to oakley, overwhelmingly impressed with lenses and amber color. These will replace my Maui jims as my everyday sunglasses. Not a competition at all oakley prism shallow water lens puts the Maui jim rose to shame
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product
customer_reviews.text: Awsome very very satisfied with my product and how fast i received it. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cardinali

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Got em as a birthday present, always wanted some since high school. Lens not polarized, so I replaced them since that are and match the logo on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Wondrrboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look SO COOL on my husband. They are very lightweight and look so smooth. I bought the gold w/ writing and the writing is more subtle than it appears in the picture, which I actually really like. It's not all gaudy and in-your-face. We like the gold "O" placard thing that can be changed, but we saved the all black ones in case the color scratched up easy. No sign yet so we will keep our fingers crossed. Expensive- but an awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Spent $150+ on these, only to have lenses go bad after a year or two. If Oakley was a reputable company, they would offer service to fix, replace, or just manufacture a higher quality lense. Trying imitation replacements now. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: RealHipHop

customer_reviews.title: Real McCoy
customer_reviews.text: I collect sunglasses. I own 28 pairs, and these are my favorite. Oakley is legit quality. “You get what you pay for”.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Maynes

customer_reviews.title: Better price on here
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them. Cheaper on here than everywhere else we checked for this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love Oakley sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love Oakley sun glasses. I have had several pair of Flak Jackets and a pair of Straight Jackets. I needed another pair of sunglasses and tried the Batwolfs on as a whim. I immediately fell in love with them. They fit my face better than any other Oakley sunglasses I have. The wrap around design make them perfect for the bike. I like that you can change the lenses out as well as the icons. Cannot go wrong with these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: You'll look 17% cooler just by putting these on...
customer_reviews.text: I started out just wearing these when I was driving. The sun can strain your eyes here in Utah and these definitely made a difference. I took them with me on a week cruise to the Caribbean and I'm glad I did. They also came with two sets of "O"s so I can use either pure silver or black and silver checkered "O"s. I'm glad I bought them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glasses at a great price! I was skeptical when ordering these because they were $106 at the time. When they came in they were legit! These were the same Batwolf's I paid $220 for years ago in a Sunglass Hut for a friend's gift. Polarized to boot. As an added bonus they even came with an extra set of interchangeable icons. They price went up but they are still worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: OAKLEY
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT.GREAT PRODUCT. HAVE A BLESSED DAY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them. They are no polarized (i thought they were) But that okay we just got different lenses to go in them. He wears them everyday and even at work, and they have lasted. We have made it almost a year and no damage!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie W

customer_reviews.title: Oakley glasses
customer_reviews.text: This was a better deal than anywhere I could find locally. Look great!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Feels very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its worth the price and doesn't fit well over nose and if you adjust then it pokes your ear
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Legit Oakleys
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have an expensive habit of losing or dropping my Oakleys off the boat. This is my 3rd pair in 2 years. Other 2 pairs I have bought from an Oakley's store, however, with COVID everything close is closed. They also came with an extra pair of Chrome ICONs! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Fits great when most sunglasses feel small. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JAFAH

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly what I wanted good quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Scott Van Scoyk

customer_reviews.title: The best around
customer_reviews.text: My husband had eye surgery and was told he would need to wear wrap around sunglasses for the next few months. These fit the bill and are comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warren

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best glasses I've ever owned. I really like how you are still able to use your peripheral vision while they are on. 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Real deal. I like the way the look. Just not on me. Actually not that bad but I went with the Gascans. You also can’t ad prescription to these lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. The Carbon Fiber emblem look a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. The Carbon Fiber emblem look a little off. Look like Gray-ish rather than darker to imitate real Carbon Fiber. But the glasses are good quality. Polarized are great. If you have a small/short nose, might be a little lose. But It's good glasses. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: biggstikk0690

customer_reviews.title: Oakley style, Oakley performance
customer_reviews.text: Clean, Oakley styled shades. Nice fit. Good optics. Modern design
customer_reviews.author: Adam Buckner

customer_reviews.title: I love the style
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, I love the glasses..... the actual ordering and handling and shipping. We're purely professional, excellent. The only set back I have is with the product itself as I put them on they pull to the left don't sit in my face squarely. I would really like some resolve to this problem, seeing how I spent almost 200 for this pair of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dark, great coverage but fog easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for light-duty glacier glasses that I could wear around town too. They are dark enough for this use and have good coverage so there's not much light sneaking in around the edges. My only complaint is that on account of this coverage, they don't have good ventilation and so fog up easily during exercise. An anti-fog coating might help.
customer_reviews.author: A. Olesen

customer_reviews.title: Wide Face Apply Here
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I love these shades. I have a wide face and I've always had problems finding sunglasses that fit me properly without any modification. The fit of these shades are perfect not too tight and not too loose, the arch doesn't hug your nose too tightly and are light. I can wear these all day without discomfort. I've had ray-bans before that were meant for wide face but they were too tight and the polarization seemed to be greenish as opposed to the polarization Oakley uses. These shades are also matte-black which is awesome, I hate the shiny gloss look. The lens is also replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: CodeEngie

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This, or the Oakley Pit Bulls are my favorite glasses ever!
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they are authentic, but it is a very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Oakley
customer_reviews.text: Lucky they are in one piece..looks like usps rode over the box..
customer_reviews.author: Useful info

customer_reviews.title: Blue Shades!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were bought for my adult son. He liked the blue tint but felt the glasses were somewhat large for his face. Otherwise, they are cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mulgrave

customer_reviews.title: Real Oakleys and great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received them today and my husband loved them. He had a pair exactly like this and loved them but while he was working they had fell and he didn’t know and he accidentally ran them over and wanted a new pair exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great Overall
customer_reviews.text: We have had multiple of these pair, Great for male bigger head, shipped in great condition
customer_reviews.author: heather barnes

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are awesome. I have a big head and these feel ...
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are awesome. I have a big head and these feel great. I ordered a 2nd pair with the polarized lense for fishing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item I really recommend you those batwolf 👍🏻👌🏻👉🏻🕶😎 good quality i been using those sunglasses for about one year and they’re still like new the frame don’t flakes off like others 🦇wolf are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper palastic than usual, but fast order.
customer_reviews.text: Was cheaper plastic than the original Batwolf, but it got here fast and will do just fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nuwud

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: 110% satisfied. I have a slightly larger than normal melon and they fit me wonderfully! Feel super comfortable and light (yet durable) on my face, very stylish. To my delight package arrived earlier than expected. Would absolutely purchase again down the road if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect my husband loved them and they are wonderful for ...
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect my husband loved them and they are wonderful for protecting his eyes from the sun. They also look super sexy on him.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jane oconner

customer_reviews.title: Look fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These aren't shoes, they are sunglasses so I did not answer the questions Amazon asked about the fit of the "shoes". Fantastic looking sunglasses that keep the sun out of your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Shan the Man

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sun glasses. They look great, and fit great! Very pleased that I ordered this product. Also the price was reasonable for such quality.
customer_reviews.author: doc2

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: This, or the Oakley Pit Bulls are my favorite glasses ever!
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were actually a gift for my son. He loves them. I love em too...gonna get me a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Classic Oakley Always Fun
customer_reviews.text: A classic Oakley design, always looking great. I ended up turning them into safety glasses with clear lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Weho_Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better
customer_reviews.text: You can not tell but these frames are larger than the fuel cell's even though they look almost just like them. They are like a cross between fuel cell's and gas can's. I love them and I received fast shipping to afghanistan eve though the shipper was not Amazon. Remember Oakley has a waranty program where you can pay $40 and ge your ruined sunglasses renewed.
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: Super sexy!
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great with everything that you wear.
customer_reviews.author: GodsReapingSoldier

customer_reviews.title: Batwolf is bad azz!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of the Fuel Cell's in the same frame color and lens finish but got rid of them to get these. The Fuel Cell frames and the Batwolf are pretty much the same with the exception of the Batwolf being more of a shield type lens...meaning instead of two separate eye lenses, there's only one lens in these. Because of the open eye area they fit my face better. The Fuel Cell frame makes me look like my eyes are too close together...not the case with the Batwolf. I've got a few other pair of Oakley frames (Antix & Oil Rig) and they all have the same single lens design. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Look... I'm a wakeboarder!
customer_reviews.text: These are some cool glasses that fit very well. Not sure how "cool" I look as I'm 44 and these should probably be worn by the 18 to 28 crowd. Nevertheless, excellent glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great product exactly like real Oakley’s help a real set of Batwolfs side by side and these are lighter yes but really no obvious signs they’re fake
customer_reviews.author: Logan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect. Also came with some neat little Oakley things for the sides
customer_reviews.author: Shelby riley

customer_reviews.title: WEARS THEM DAILY
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them ( and he is really really picky). He has other Oakleys, so knew how they would fit I think, but he loves them, wears them daily
customer_reviews.author: DJMiMiMama

customer_reviews.title: Best Oakley's yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Brother and he loves them. He states Best Oakley's yet.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than purchasing at the store
customer_reviews.text: I bought the glasses for my son. We had seen them at the mall for $50 more. The ones purchased through Amazon had a nicer case than what the glass store had to offer. I'm not big on sun glasses, but my teen boy loves them.
customer_reviews.author: SciPhi

customer_reviews.title: Well made in USA. Fit my head well. ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made in USA. Fit my head well. the only thing is the purple logo is a kind of...prefer red. but all in all very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Qi

customer_reviews.title: Hot sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my younger brother and he totally LOVES them. They are well made well (of course) with a killer, aggressive design. They are worth every penny and will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: talltreesinc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of Oakleys
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of Oakleys, my only issue was the box it comes in gets pretty beat up during shipping.. It had no effects on the quality of sunglasses. Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Love Oakley!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. Jumped off the boat with them on my head the first time- DERP!! Bought a second pair. We go motorcycle, BMX riding, always wearing them. Lost one of my purple Oakley O's and thought it was time to put the black O's in and make these my outside glasses and get me some new ones for driving only. Love Oakley!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: They are very large, uncomfortable with flat billed fitted hat. Love the look, just not the most comfortable shades.
customer_reviews.author: ASUSM3NAC3

customer_reviews.title: Your welcome, ladies.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses turned me from boring loser, to MEGA-STUD with the flick of the wrist!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are nice oak's However the size is too small.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and really nice fit! I love this sunglasses!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased/Hot buy
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé is so very pleased with his glasses. He smiles everytime he takes them out to wear them. Extremely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: SRunk

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for dad for Christmas and he went crazy over them. They look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my brother. He loves the wraparound ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother. He loves the wraparound feature, although they fit snugly to his face, so can produce condensation on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frazer

customer_reviews.title: or overall just be plain bad as far a sun protection for your eyes goes
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair years ago which were the first pair of Oakley's I have ever owned. After going through cheap $1-20 pairs for years that would either break, scratch, or overall just be plain bad as far a sun protection for your eyes goes, these glasses were a revelation for eye ware for me. After I finally broke my old pair, I had to order another as I have seen how the pair held up and performed for all sorts of activities throughout all seasons. At the Snow, on the Water, Driving, Flying, Riding, they work great everywhere and look darn good on me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Oakley batwolf
customer_reviews.text: I liked how cool I looked in my Oakley sunglasses 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Lens issue
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these glasses and they are very good especially on the bike. But the lens keeps popping out of the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Yanek

customer_reviews.title: Rugged & Strong
customer_reviews.text: Rugged looking.. I have a somewhat oversized head and they are just a tad bit loose.. Probably a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: John M....

customer_reviews.title: High quality shades.
customer_reviews.text: Some high quality shades right here. Was not an Oakley customer until this model . Love the plaid Oakley "O's.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of Oakleys!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these glasses for a month now and they are awesome! I love the blue/green iridium lenses they dim light just the perfect amount I can easily see my computer and phone screens while wearing them. The frames are very strong yet light weight which is great cause I spend a lot of my day outside and will sometimes wear these for 8-10 hours a day. The stay on with no problem and don't even start to slip when my head gets sweaty. Awesome glasses, but I would expect nothing less from Oakley!
customer_reviews.author: Bear M

customer_reviews.title: it is an oakley!
customer_reviews.text: very good item, light and fits perfectly! the replacing Os would not be necessary but I did like this model so, no worries there... recommended!

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Gave them to my son for Christmas. He loved them!

customer_reviews.text: Hey as expected Oakley always comes out with something great!Batwolf clear/ Ice iridium. They fit just a little bit tight it.but I personally like my sunglasses snug to my face so they don't fall off in activity. It can be compensated.Definitely worth the investment . Thank you Oakley

customer_reviews.text: Perfect and fantastic product ... Totally agree with the ad. Recommend and endorse this product.

customer_reviews.title: You are gonna love em!
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice fitting glasses. I bought them for my son for Christmas and he loves them. He says he is getting complimented all the time on these glasses!

customer_reviews.text: I ONLY WEAR OAKLEYS AND I LOVE THE BATWOLFS! These Emerald Iridium are Real Nice! Now for Protection against the sun The Emerald Iridium does Okay The Black Iridium work a lot better for Sun Protection Other than that Awesome Look and Great Pair of Glasses That's All I buy and Preach is OAKLEY! =)
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sunglasses, the fit is perfect, they look good (I'm told, I'm blind). Steve Loutherback and Carmen Hanratty

customer_reviews.text: Oakley Batwolf Polarized Sunglasses fit and feel great. Great for work and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Brett R

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyyyyy TO BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black with purple emblems on the side in "one size" as in one size fits all... They looked so ridiculous on my that I applied for the refund as soon as I got back from the post office. If your a man with a big head I'm sure that size will be perfect. But if you're a woman with a normal head don't get the one size fits all. And the only reason I gave it four starts versus three was because they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGIrl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits small and the white is transparent. Feel a bit obnoxious looking.
customer_reviews.author: Vitor

customer_reviews.title: He loves Oakley and I know he will love these. They look so stylish and cool
customer_reviews.text: A birthday gift for my son...He loves Oakley and I know he will love these. They look so stylish and cool, great price! Thanks Amazon, Nancy B in AR

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good experience, I recommend it widely, the shipment arrived on time. the product was exactly the that I wanted

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these glasses love them.
customer_reviews.author: stang07

customer_reviews.title: Best shades ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these things. They're very durable and always made everything seem clearer. Would definitely recommend these for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy, cheapest place I found them no store could price match, same warranty as stores, good design, only needs polarized lens to make them nicer, but they mold to your head very nicely, suggest try them on in a store first
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday gift for my husband who has a wide head, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Angela A. Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for these at a good price everywhere for a month straight
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for these at a good price everywhere for a month straight. Popped this bad boy into my Amazon cart to watch the price fluctuate (as Amazon products normally do) and in four days it dropped to 101.99 so that's how much I got them for. With no tax. I got a good price on some genuine oakleys that I love the clear frame and the blue lenses. They match my work uniform colors so it works out. I would recommend these for someone who is looking for these
customer_reviews.author: imfromthelou

product_meta.title: Oakley Men's Oo9101 Batwolf Shield Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The Oakley Batwolf is designed with a single continuous lens set in a comfortably lightweight O Matter frame. Each pair of Batwolf sunglasses sport Oakley's famous Plutonite lenses that block 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm as well as a three-point fit system designed to eliminate pressure points for comfort and everyday wear. Two interchangeable metal icons are included to change the look of your Batwolf in seconds.
feature_bullets: Sporty sunglasses featuring bold O-Matter frame with single continuous lens and logoed temples
